summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4636 for the improvement of 36th Avenue Southwest, from West Holly street to West Willow Street, by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 53938, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
